main event: A UFO sighting occurred at Ocean Station Delta, where an extremely bright object with a long tail was observed, initially thought to be a meteor sighting.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 6-7 seconds,The object was extremely bright and had a long tail,The object was observed through a thin layer of strato cumulus clouds,Multiple reports were compiled across different messages concerning the sighting,The trajectory of the object diminished in brightness before disappearing.
sighted object: extremely bright object with a long tail
witness description: Captain WA Woodman and Second Officer HW Schonn
